segments.source_content: [SuperTokens](https://supertokens.com/) is an open core alternative to proprietary login providers like Auth0 or AWS Cognito.

translations.zh-CN: [SuperTokens](https://supertokens.com/) 是专有登录服务（如 Auth0 或 AWS Cognito）的开源替代方案。

segments.source_content: SuperTokens allows you to use SAML Jackson as a custom OAuth provider.

translations.zh-CN: SuperTokens 允许您将 SAML Jackson 作为自定义 OAuth 提供商使用。

segments.source_content: Follow [this documentation](https://supertokens.com/docs/thirdpartyemailpassword/common-customizations/saml/with-boxyhq/integration-steps) to learn about how to use SAML Jackson with SuperTokens.

translations.zh-CN: 请参阅[此文档](https://supertokens.com/docs/thirdpartyemailpassword/common-customizations/saml/with-boxyhq/integration-steps)了解如何将 SAML Jackson 与 SuperTokens 结合使用。

segments.source_content: Visit our [GitHub repo](https://github.com/supertokens/jackson-supertokens-express) to see the source code for the SuperTokens SAML SSO integration. We also have a [Next.js + Supertokens + Jackson](https://github.com/nadilas/jackson-next-supertokens) integration for you to draw inspiration from.

translations.zh-CN: 访问我们的 [GitHub 仓库](https://github.com/supertokens/jackson-supertokens-express)查看 SuperTokens SAML SSO 集成的源代码。我们还提供了 [Next.js + Supertokens + Jackson](https://github.com/nadilas/jackson-next-supertokens) 集成示例供您参考。
